video.title: Bones
video.synopsis: A forensic anthropologist teams up with an FBI agent to investigate crimes that have left scant evidence behind: namely, the bones of the deceased.

episodes.synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Brennan teams up with FBI agent Booth to investigate the famous unsolved murder of a young female Senate intern.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate a case concerning a Middle Eastern diplomat accused of a suicide bombing; they suspect the alleged terrorist was framed.
episodes.title: The Man in the SUV

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Brennan and Booth investigate the hanging death of a prep school student; all signs point to suicide, but their investigation yields two suspects.
episodes.title: A Boy in a Tree

episodes.synopsis: After a human hand is found inside a black bear, Brennan travels to a small town in Washington state with Booth to investigate the case.
episodes.title: The Man in the Bear

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth work together to find out who sexually assaulted and murdered a young boy found in a field.
episodes.title: A Boy in a Bush

episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan search for answers after the mummified body of a hip-hop DJ is unearthed behind the wall of a nightclub.
episodes.title: The Man in the Wall

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate the case of a man on death row whom some believe to be innocent; they dig up new evidence -- and two other murders.
episodes.title: The Man on Death Row

episodes.synopsis: Brennan is pitted against an old boyfriend after she's called to testify in a case involving a woman whose corpse was discovered in a refrigerator.
episodes.title: The Girl in the Fridge

episodes.synopsis: Brennan, Booth and the others are quarantined in the lab on Christmas after the body of an unidentified man is discovered in a bomb shelter.
episodes.title: The Man in the Fallout Shelter

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth travel to Los Angeles to investigate the murder of a call girl who had a great deal of plastic surgery on her face.
episodes.title: The Woman at the Airport

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth search for a missing 8-year-old boy whose mother was murdered and whose father is about to testify in a controversial case.
episodes.title: The Woman in the Car

episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan search for answers after a comic book fan dressed up as a superhero is found dead.
episodes.title: The Superhero in the Alley

episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan link two decomposed bodies to a street gang operating out of a Salvadoran neighborhood -- and to a United States senator.
episodes.title: The Woman in the Garden

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Zack investigate a crash involving a flight carrying Chinese diplomats; they find bone fragments not belonging to anyone on the flight.
episodes.title: The Man on the Fairway

episodes.synopsis: Brennan becomes the target of an assassination while investigating the seemingly unrelated murders of a mob boss and a young college student.
episodes.title: Two Bodies in the Lab

episodes.synopsis: With help from a homeless man, the investigators search an abandoned tunnel system beneath Washington, hoping to solve the murder of a filmmaker.
episodes.title: The Woman in the Tunnel

episodes.synopsis: When Angela's boyfriend goes missing in the Santa Fe desert, Brennan and Booth rush out to lead the search.
episodes.title: The Skull in the Desert

episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan investigate a murder on Assateague Island: Legend holds it is home to Blackbeard's buried treasure.
episodes.title: The Man with the Bone

episodes.synopsis: Brennan goes to New Orleans to aid in the identification of the bodies found in the aftermath of Hurricane Katrina, only to end up a murder suspect.
episodes.title: The Man in the Morgue

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth track the source of a young woman's lung cancer to a renegade company selling tainted bone grafts.
episodes.title: The Graft in the Girl

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate an apparent war protest involving the charred remains of a body left on the grave of a soldier killed in Iraq.
episodes.title: The Soldier on the Grave

episodes.synopsis: When the remains of a Jane Doe turn out to be Brennan's mother, Brennan must face who her parents really were... and why they disappeared years ago.
episodes.title: The Woman in Limbo

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate the site of a train derailment that includes the bodies of a senator and a high-profile businessman.
episodes.title: The Titan on the Tracks

episodes.synopsis: The remains of a pregnant woman are found in the Delaware Bay and are likely that of Carlie Richardson, a highly publicized case.
episodes.title: Mother and Child in the Bay

episodes.synopsis: When a teenage runaway is murdered, all suspicion is immediately placed on his girlfriend, another runaway from the foster care system.
episodes.title: The Boy in the Shroud

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth match wits with a serial killer to save a teenage girl's life.
episodes.title: The Blonde in the Game

episodes.synopsis: An electrician's body is found soaked in a corrosive liquid-filled tub, leading the team to surprising secrets the man had been harboring.
episodes.title: The Truth in the Lye

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate a deadly explosion at a hotel where a conference on drug trafficking was being held.
episodes.title: The Girl in Suite 2103

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate the death of a 10-year-old beauty pageant star who went missing six months prior.
episodes.title: The Girl with the Curl

episodes.synopsis: The remains of a federal agent and a Jane Doe, found in the desert outside Las Vegas, lead Brennan and Booth into the world of ultimate fighting.
episodes.title: The Woman in the Sand

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Hodgins become the victims of the Gravedigger, a serial killer who buries his victims alive while demanding a ransom for their release.
episodes.title: Aliens in a Spaceship

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate the death of a film student who was working on a documentary about the legend of a witch who haunts a local forest.
episodes.title: The Headless Witch in the Woods

episodes.synopsis: The murder of a former FBI agent uncovers a decades-old conspiracy that may involve Brennan's father.
episodes.title: Judas on a Pole

episodes.synopsis: When notorious serial killer Howard Epps escapes from prison, everyone connected to Brennan becomes a target.
episodes.title: The Man in the Cell

episodes.synopsis: After Booth is placed on leave, Brennan partners with another agent to investigate the death of a college student killed on spring break.
episodes.title: The Girl in the Gator

episodes.synopsis: Brennan receives a special request to investigate the death of a wealthy donor to the Jeffersonian with whom Hodgins is personally connected.
episodes.title: The Man in the Mansion

episodes.synopsis: Life imitates art as three murders occur which exactly mirror those in Brennan's novel. Sully's protectiveness of Brennan strains their relationship.
episodes.title: The Bodies in the Book

episodes.synopsis: Booth constantly interrupts Brennan's vacation with Sully to get help with the case of a woman whose boneless body was found in a river.
episodes.title: The Boneless Bride in the River

episodes.synopsis: A water-main break at a historical cemetery unearths remains, leading to the discovery of a recent murder.
episodes.title: The Priest in the Churchyard

episodes.synopsis: When Booth is kidnapped by a Mafia crime boss while investigating a murder, Brennan receives help from an unlikely source: her fugitive father.
episodes.title: The Killer in the Concrete

episodes.synopsis: When a body that fell from the sky shows signs of having been in space for a substantial amount of time, Brennan's team comes up with theories.
episodes.title: Spaceman in a Crater

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate the case of a murdered celebrity chef whose bones are found in an old stone house ... and could be radioactive.
episodes.title: The Glowing Bones in the Old Stone House

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate the death of a young girl; Brennan's father resurfaces; and Hodgins and Angela take a trip down the aisle.
episodes.title: Stargazer in a Puddle

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth discover a skull with gnaw marks made by human teeth, which leads them to a secret cannibalistic society.
episodes.title: The Widow's Son in the Windshield

episodes.synopsis: When a soccer mom gets killed by a bomb in her minivan, her secret past is revealed. Meanwhile, Brennan struggles to come to terms with her father.
episodes.title: Soccer Mom in the Mini-Van

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the body of a man found in the woods. The case leads to a lodge where women act as jockeys and the men as their horses.
episodes.title: Death in the Saddle

episodes.synopsis: When an organic farmer is found murdered and later exposed as a philanderer, the team ends up investigating a double homicide.
episodes.title: The Secret in the Soil

episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan investigate the mummified remains of two teenagers found at an amusement park. Later, the team attends an annual Halloween ball.
episodes.title: Mummy in the Maze

episodes.synopsis: The remains of a Jeffersonian intern -- the daughter of a respected scientist -- are found in the incinerator. Is it the work of a serial killer?
episodes.title: Intern in the Incinerator

episodes.synopsis: When the body of a long-missing computer geek turns up in a 1987 time capsule, the victim's peers become the focus of the investigation.
episodes.title: Boy in the Time Capsule

episodes.synopsis: The Widow's Son serial killer strikes again -- a bit too close to home. Meanwhile, Brennan is reunited with her brother.
episodes.title: The Knight on the Grid

episodes.synopsis: A murdered mall Santa appears to have really been Kris Kringle, but his secrets are uncovered. Elsewhere, Booth and Brennan deal with family issues.
episodes.title: The Santa in the Slush

episodes.synopsis: A motorcycle racer's skeleton is found in a hot spring, but just as the team thinks they've solved the case, another bike crash deepens the mystery.
episodes.title: The Man in the Mud

episodes.synopsis: When a star college basketball player is murdered, there are several suspects... more than one of whom may be guilty of the killing.
episodes.title: Player Under Pressure

episodes.synopsis: Brennan takes care of a baby whose mother has been murdered. But Brennan's maternal skills are called into question when the infant swallows evidence.
episodes.title: The Baby in the Bough

episodes.synopsis: Max's trial begins, and Brennan's colleagues are called as witnesses for the prosecution. As an advisor for the defense, can Brennan exonerate Max?
episodes.title: The Verdict in the Story

episodes.synopsis: When an aspiring singer is murdered, his fans and foes are investigated -- particularly one obsessed woman who redirects her affections toward Booth.
episodes.title: The Wannabe in the Weeds

episodes.synopsis: The Gormogon serial killer has struck again, and when the silver skeleton disappears from the vault, every Jeffersonian employee becomes a suspect.
episodes.title: The Pain in the Heart

episodes.synopsis: While guest-lecturing in London, Brennan and Booth are asked by Scotland Yard to assist with a murder investigation regarding a young heiress.
episodes.title: Yanks in the U.K.: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: Pritchard asks Booth and Brennan to help investigate another murder, this one hitting closer to home. And Cam makes an impulsive decision.
episodes.title: Yanks in the U.K.: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When a reality-TV show host is found dead in an outhouse, Brennan and Booth have a large pool of suspects, many of whom were humiliated on the show.
episodes.title: The Man in the Outhouse

episodes.synopsis: When Booth's son finds a severed finger in a bird's nest, the trail leads to a veterinarian involved with an illegal dog-fighting ring.
episodes.title: The Finger in the Nest

episodes.synopsis: A headless corpse belongs to a germophobic sci-fi writer. Without the head, there isn't enough evidence to find the killer -- until Zack lends a hand.
episodes.title: The Perfect Pieces in the Purple Pond

episodes.synopsis: The remains of a disliked office manager are found in a building elevator shaft. And Hodgins and Angela navigate their post-breakup relationship.
episodes.title: The Crank in the Shaft

episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan investigate the death of a pastor with a mysterious past. Her breast implants and missing lower half lead to misleading assumptions.
episodes.title: The He in the She

episodes.synopsis: When the smashed remains of an artist are found in an impounded junkyard car, the team must race to find evidence before the car is put on exhibit.
episodes.title: The Skull in the Sculpture

episodes.synopsis: The body of an inventor's father is found, but the team is left wondering when another body surfaces. And Brennan dates Booth's brother.
episodes.title: The Con Man in the Meth Lab

episodes.synopsis: While Booth and Brennan are en route to Shanghai, a body is found in the airplane's oven; they try to solve the case before the plane lands in China.
episodes.title: The Passenger in the Oven

episodes.synopsis: Various skeletal remains of a long-missing ex-Marine lead to the investigation of an elite private school and the powerful families there.
episodes.title: The Bone That Blew

episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan must infiltrate a traveling circus to investigate the death of conjoined-twin jugglers -- and do so undercover as a performance act.
episodes.title: Double Trouble in the Panhandle

episodes.synopsis: Booth is a suspect in the murder of a hockey player he fought with during a recent game, so Brennan must work on the case with FBI agent Perotta.
episodes.title: Fire in the Ice

episodes.synopsis: The Gravedigger killer returns and abducts Booth, demanding that evidence that would lead to his capture be returned in exchange for Booth's release.
episodes.title: The Hero in the Hold

episodes.synopsis: The body of a woman wearing a medieval dress leads to an investigation at a sci-fi/fantasy convention. The victim owned a prized piece of memorabilia.
episodes.title: The Princess and the Pear

episodes.synopsis: A man found in a gorge was already dead before he was thrown off the bridge, thus ruling out suicide. At the lab, his bones start to disintegrate.
episodes.title: The Bones That Foam

episodes.synopsis: A petrified human body is found buried in a mound of salt. The victim is a high school volleyball player who's been missing for three weeks.
episodes.title: The Salt in the Wounds

episodes.synopsis: The half-eaten body of Cam's former fiancée is found in the tiger cage at the zoo, and Booth and Brennan determine that the death was no accident.
episodes.title: The Doctor in the Den

episodes.synopsis: Pulverized human remains contain a meteorite shard, which leads the team to a physics lab. The victim had been working on a controversial project.
episodes.title: The Science in the Physicist

episodes.synopsis: An image of the Virgin Mary at a recycling plant turns out to be an outline of dried human blood from a body. The victim had been planning a wedding.
episodes.title: The Cinderella in the Cardboard

episodes.synopsis: A human skeleton being used as a prop for a death-metal band turns out to be the remains of a murdered bassist named Mayhem from another band.
episodes.title: Mayhem on a Cross

episodes.synopsis: When one of their colleagues dies of a heart attack, Brennan finds broken bones; before the body is cremated, she and Cam must steal it to examine it.
episodes.title: The Double Death of the Dearly Departed

episodes.synopsis: When a detective's sister goes missing in Washington, Booth and Brennan find her decapitated head, and the investigation leads to an escort service.
episodes.title: The Girl in the Mask

episodes.synopsis: When a body is found in an Otter costume (a university mascot), Brennan and Booth investigate whether the victim was killed during a school event.
episodes.title: The Beaver in the Otter

episodes.synopsis: The body of a wine critic is found inside a barrel of wine during a tasting. Meanwhile, Brennan wants a child and asks Booth to be the father.
episodes.title: The Critic in the Cabernet

episodes.synopsis: Everyone is a suspect when a body is found at a nightclub. In an unusual twist, Brennan, Booth and the team take on roles outside their normal duties.
episodes.title: The End in the Beginning

episodes.synopsis: Angela's psychic (guest star Cyndi Lauper) predicts there are multiple bodies buried under a fountain. Booth and Brennan find 11 bodies exactly so.
episodes.title: Harbingers in a Fountain

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate the body of a man killed for the contents of his briefcase. Evidence leads the team to suspect secret operatives.
episodes.title: The Bond in the Boot

episodes.synopsis: When human remains are found alongside the railroad, Brennan and Booth are called to the case. The bones belong to a member of the Amish community.
episodes.title: The Plain in the Prodigy

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate remains found at a neighborhood block party. Suburban scandals give each neighbor in the cul-de-sac a motive.
episodes.title: The Beautiful Day in the Neighborhood

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth are called to investigate what appears to be charred human remains on an electrical fence. The corpse is determined to be a mummy.
episodes.title: A Night at the Bones Museum

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the mutilated remains of a chicken farmer who was set to inherit a chicken factory aggressively protested for animal cruelty.
episodes.title: The Tough Man in the Tender Chicken

episodes.synopsis: Still suffering some lingering effects from his brain surgery, Booth has to get recertified for FBI marksmanship, but is not the accurate shot he was.
episodes.title: The Dwarf in the Dirt

episodes.synopsis: Booth's grandfather, Hank, comes to live with him and tags along as Brennan and Booth investigate charred remains found by a real estate agent.
episodes.title: The Foot in the Foreclosure

episodes.synopsis: When remains are discovered in a truck, Brennan and Booth learn the victim was the only player to have achieved a perfect score on a video game.
episodes.title: The Gamer in the Grease

episodes.synopsis: When a man dressed as Santa blows himself up during a botched bank robbery, Brennan and Booth work to identify the bomber and determine his motives.
episodes.title: The Goop on the Girl

episodes.synopsis: An out-of-this-world case brings Brennan and Booth to New Mexico, where they investigate human remains with extraterrestrial attributes.
episodes.title: The X in the File

episodes.synopsis: Government agents put the lab on lock down and demand that Brennan and her team determine a cause of death for a highly classified set of remains.
episodes.title: The Proof in the Pudding

episodes.synopsis: When a human skeleton is discovered in the trenches of an old Civil War battleground, Brennan and Booth are called to the case.
episodes.title: The Dentist in the Ditch

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate a set of uniquely disfigured remains allegorizing biblical text. They learn that the victim is a former mental patient.
episodes.title: The Devil in the Details

episodes.synopsis: When a subway train is thrown off the track by 60,000 gallons of flood water, a partially skeletonized body emerges out of the overflow.
episodes.title: The Bones on the Blue Line

episodes.synopsis: The milestone 100th episode takes viewers back six years as Brennan and Booth recount the first case they worked on together.
episodes.title: The Parts in the Sum of the Whole

episodes.synopsis: The team's latest case takes Brennan back to high school, where she and Booth investigate the discovery of an unidentified skull and upper torso.
episodes.title: The Death of the Queen Bee

episodes.synopsis: When human remains are found in a shark, Brennan and Booth are sent in to identify the person. Evidence suggests the victim was prey to several fish.
episodes.title: The Predator in the Pool

episodes.synopsis: When the body of a rich thrill-seeker is found in a laundry machine, Booth and Brennan go to the last place he was seen: a rock 'n' roll fantasy camp.
episodes.title: The Rocker in the Rinse Cycle

episodes.synopsis: A cabin burns down in the woods revealing two bodies -- one of a modern-day witch and one from the days of the Salem Witch Trials.
episodes.title: The Witch in the Wardrobe

episodes.synopsis: The trial of the Gravedigger hits close to home, and everyone at the Jeffersonian works overtime to uncover the forensic evidence for a conviction.
episodes.title: The Boy with the Answer

episodes.synopsis: The team works to uncover clues buried under a life's worth of possessions saved by a hoarder in order to solve the mystery of his death.
episodes.title: The Beginning in the End

episodes.synopsis: In the season opener, Brennan and Booth return from overseas to help save Cam's job and to solve a troubling case involving a child.
episodes.title: The Mastodon in the Room

episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan investigate a pair of bodies discovered in a national park cave, and Booth's new girlfriend makes a surprise visit.
episodes.title: The Couple in the Cave

episodes.synopsis: Brennan proves to be cooler than anyone expected -- sort of -- when she and Booth investigate a decomposing body at the Jersey Shore.
episodes.title: The Maggots in the Meathead

episodes.synopsis: After examining a decomposing skull and hands found in a trash bin, Booth and Brennan set out to identify the victim and his killer.
episodes.title: The Body and the Bounty

episodes.synopsis: When the remains of a slain ballerina are discovered, Brennan and Booth uncover a shadowy connection to a gang of street performers.
episodes.title: The Bones That Weren't

episodes.synopsis: When Booth and Brennan examine 150-year-old human remains on a centuries-old slave ship, they also find evidence of a much more recent murder.
episodes.title: The Shallow in the Deep

episodes.synopsis: Booth and Brennan are called to a candy factory when a human skull is found inside the world's largest chocolate bar.
episodes.title: The Babe in the Bar

episodes.synopsis: A student-teacher relationship leads to a fatal attraction, and it's up to Booth and Brennan to track down the murder weapon.
episodes.title: The Twisted Bones in the Melted Truck

episodes.synopsis: A case becomes surprisingly personal for Brennan when she begins looking into the life of a doctor who was brutally slain in a rough part of town.
episodes.title: The Doctor in the Photo

episodes.synopsis: An investigation gets messy when a body is found in a shower, and Booth and Brennan's relationship disrupts the team.
episodes.title: The Body in the Bag

episodes.synopsis: The final appeal of the Gravedigger's death sentence takes a shocking turn, and the Jeffersonian team is tasked with getting to the bottom of it.
episodes.title: The Bullet in the Brain

episodes.synopsis: When a man is found dead in a cornfield dressed as a scarecrow, Booth and Brennan discover that he was a polygamist whose wives were also sisters.
episodes.title: The Sin in the Sisterhood

episodes.synopsis: When a BMX bike stunt goes wrong, Booth and Brennan are called to a warehouse rooftop to investigate the remains. Was it an accident, or murder?
episodes.title: The Daredevil in the Mold

episodes.synopsis: On Valentine's Day, Brennan and Booth are called to examine the remains of a wedding planner found liquefied in her tanning bed.
episodes.title: The Bikini in the Soup

episodes.synopsis: Booth calls on his military training to thwart Jacob Broadsky, a sniper bent on dispensing vigilante justice to crooks who beat the system.
episodes.title: The Killer in the Crosshairs

episodes.synopsis: When the power goes out during a blizzard, Brennan, Booth and the team must go old-school tech to prevent the outbreak of a lethal virus.
episodes.title: The Blackout in the Blizzard

episodes.synopsis: Brennan joins forces with a Canadian forensics specialist to identify eight pairs of feet that wash up after a flood near the Canadian border.
episodes.title: The Feet on the Beach

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth take on the unusual case of a man who was apparently slain by a mythical beast whose existence the victim was trying to disprove.
episodes.title: The Truth in the Myth

episodes.synopsis: Booth turns to an acquaintance who can find anything to help the team solve a case that involves an ancient treasure map and a dead security guard.
episodes.title: The Finder

episodes.synopsis: When an advertising executive is found buried in a playground, Booth and Brennan suspect the victim's abrasive honesty may have cost him his life.
episodes.title: The Pinocchio in the Planter

episodes.synopsis: When a deaf girl found covered in blood and wielding a knife refuses to cooperate with the team, they suspect she may be a killer.
episodes.title: The Signs in the Silence

episodes.synopsis: Elusive sniper Jacob Broadsky begins another reign of terror, and this time it's personal as he targets Booth and Brennan's team.
episodes.title: The Hole in the Heart

episodes.synopsis: Baffled by human remains stuffed into the machinery in a bowling alley, Brennan and Booth go undercover and join a bowling league to solve the crime.
episodes.title: The Change in the Game

episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the death of a woman found in a paintball field, and Brennan and Booth adjust to life as an expectant couple.
episodes.title: The Memories in the Shallow Grave

episodes.synopsis: Finn helps solve the mysterious death of a competitive-eating champion just days before the start of the Gluttony Games, a premier eating competition.
episodes.title: The Hot Dog in the Competition

episodes.synopsis: When the remains of a woman are found shrink-wrapped with a doll, Booth and Sweets enter the high-stakes world of toy manufacturing to solve the case.
episodes.title: The Prince in the Plastic

episodes.synopsis: When dismembered remains are found in mailing boxes at a dead letter office, the team uncovers a love triangle among a group of lottery winners.
episodes.title: The Male in the Mail

episodes.synopsis: The team discovers the remains of a storm chaser who died while following a tornado, but footage recorded during the storm suggests he was murdered.
episodes.title: The Twist in the Twister

episodes.synopsis: A cryptic message penned in human blood is discovered at a national monument, and the Jeffersonian team embarks on a scavenger hunt to solve the case.
episodes.title: The Crack in the Code

episodes.synopsis: When the remains of an escaped convict are found in a sewer, pregnant Brennan insists on solving the crime despite Booth's pleas for her to stay away.
episodes.title: The Prisoner in the Pipe

episodes.synopsis: With the help of Special Agent Genny Shaw, the team identifies the remains of an "extreme couponer" who was dragged along the road by an 18-wheeler.
episodes.title: The Bump in the Road

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the death of a corpse that's been dyed blue and dumped in a landfill, and Bones feels uncomfortable in her post-baby body.
episodes.title: The Don't in the Do

episodes.synopsis: When the corpse of a truck company employee is found deep in the woods, Booth and Brennan visit a karate class in a search of clues.
episodes.title: The Warrior in the Wuss

episodes.synopsis: When a dead body is found in the middle of the forest, the team links the victim to two families that have been feuding for almost a century.
episodes.title: The Family in the Feud

episodes.synopsis: While in Los Angeles consulting on a film based on Brennan's new book, she and Booth investigate the violent death of the movie's prop cadaver.
episodes.title: The Suit on the Set

episodes.synopsis: When a court appeal might set evil tech genius Christopher Pelant free from prison, the Jeffersonian team doubles down to keep him behind bars.
episodes.title: The Past in the Present

episodes.synopsis: Having been accused of murder, Brennan is on the run. The team is convinced evil tech genius Christopher Pelant has framed her as the prime suspect.
episodes.title: The Future in the Past

episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the murder of a high-powered divorce lawyer with a lot of enemies.
episodes.title: The Partners in the Divorce

episodes.synopsis: After an explosion occurs in a hotel garage, the team must research the remains found at the crime scene in order to match them to the assumed victim.
episodes.title: The Gunk in the Garage

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the death of an animal expo employee, and through the  case, they enter the world of illegal animal trafficking.
episodes.title: The Tiger in the Tale

episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the death of a woman whose body was found mutilated and discarded in a city garbage can.
episodes.title: The Method in the Madness

episodes.synopsis: Brennan calls upon five of her best "squinterns" to complete the task of identifying remains that have been deemed unidentifiable.
episodes.title: The Patriot in Purgatory

episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the death of a crime scene cleanup expert whose remains are found mysteriously sealed in an impenetrable pod.
episodes.title: The Bod in the Pod

episodes.synopsis: A street artist, who is plastering his art on a billboard, falls and lands into his own glue -- and into human remains, which the team investigates.
episodes.title: The But in the Joke

episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the death of a young boy whose soul remains very much alive.
episodes.title: The Ghost in the Machine

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the death of a ballroom dancer who was murdered three days before her audition on a popular dancing competition show.
episodes.title: The Diamond in the Rough

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the murder of an archaeologist with a questionable reputation who came upon a career-defining discovery right before his death.
episodes.title: The Archaeologist in the Cocoon

episodes.synopsis: After Angela and Hodgins wake up to find a bloody corpse hanging above their bed, they decide to start an investigation without the Jeffersonian team.
episodes.title: The Corpse on the Canopy

episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the remains of two bodies that were found at the same burial plot.
episodes.title: The Twist in the Plot

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth investigate the death of a female roller derby skater whose body was dismembered. They enlist Angie to go undercover as a skater.
episodes.title: The Doll in the Derby

episodes.synopsis: When Brennan is shot while working late at the Jeffersonian lab, she is rushed to the hospital in critical condition.
episodes.title: The Shot in the Dark

episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the remains of a seemingly innocent 15-year-old boy who was actually involved in illegal activity and drugs.
episodes.title: The Friend in Need

episodes.synopsis: A new intern with eccentric but undeniable observations causes Brennan to try to be more open-minded about many scientific questions.
episodes.title: The Fact in the Fiction

episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the death of a young man whose remains were found in a barrel at a hazardous waste disposal facility.
episodes.title: The Survivor in the Soap

episodes.synopsis: When the team investigates the death of a former Marine sergeant, they discover that she was discharged after a fistfight with another Marine.
episodes.title: The Doom in the Gloom

episodes.synopsis: When an undercover cop who was investigating a string of ATM robberies turns up dead, the team must figure out whether the robbers are also murderers.
episodes.title: The Blood from the Stones

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the murder of a TV producer. Meanwhile, Brennan has trouble accepting the fact that Christine might be an "average" child.
episodes.title: The Maiden in the Mushroom

episodes.synopsis: The Jeffersonian team investigates the murder of Jack Spindler, a successful employee at a brokerage firm by day but a stripper by night.
episodes.title: The Party in the Pants

episodes.synopsis: The team rushes to prevent a viral outbreak while investigating the murder of a journalist whose infected body is found at a biohazard facility.
episodes.title: The Pathos in the Pathogens

episodes.synopsis: In their newest investigation, the team discovers that the string of murders that have been occurring are tied to FBI agents close to Booth.
episodes.title: The Secret in the Siege

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates remains found in an air-conditioning unit. Meanwhile, Booth seeks advice on his relationship with Brennan.
episodes.title: The Secrets in the Proposal

episodes.synopsis: Brennan and Booth go undercover at a management retreat to investigate the murder of a consultant. Meanwhile, Cam's identity is stolen.
episodes.title: The Cheat in the Retreat

episodes.synopsis: Sweets returns from sabbatical to help the team investigate the murder of a gang member when he realizes he has a personal connection to the case.
episodes.title: El Carnicero en el Coche

episodes.synopsis: When Pelant returns, the team sets out to trap him with the assistance of Special Agent Flynn and a donated human cadaver.
episodes.title: The Sense in the Sacrifice

episodes.synopsis: The investigation into a terminal cancer patient's murder leads to the discovery of his bucket list and a video of him punching a UFC champ.
episodes.title: The Lady on the List

episodes.synopsis: Cam and Angela try to prevent a difficult case from distracting Brennan as she prepares for her wedding.
episodes.title: The Woman in White

episodes.synopsis: On their honeymoon in Buenos Aires, a restless Brennan and Booth join a local detective in investigating the murder of a Nazi war criminal.
episodes.title: The Nazi on the Honeymoon

episodes.synopsis: The investigation into the death of a male model reveals that he falsified records when donating to a sperm bank.
episodes.title: The Dude in the Dam

episodes.synopsis: Shortly after Brennan, serving on a jury, proves a soccer star innocent in the murder of his wife, the athlete's best friend turns up dead.
episodes.title: The Fury in the Jury

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the murder of a food scientist whose remains were tossed in a meat grinder and mixed into cans of stew served in a cafeteria.
episodes.title: The Mystery in the Meat

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the murder of a nationally ranked gymnast, whose remains were hit by lightning and scattered throughout a public park.
episodes.title: The Spark in the Park

episodes.synopsis: When the team investigates exhumed remains to prove the deceased was murdered, Brennan's dreams seem to point to the killer's identity.
episodes.title: The Ghost in the Killer

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the murder of a country music singer who had an ax to grind with his record label, and Brennan examines Wendall's broken arm.
episodes.title: Big in the Philippines

episodes.synopsis: Sweets surprises the team with his chess skills and goes undercover in the world of professional chess to find a killer.
episodes.title: The Master in the Slop

episodes.synopsis: When a young kidnapping victim is found murdered, the team learns that she had a difficult relationship with her stepmother.
episodes.title: The Heiress in the Hill

episodes.synopsis: When a CIA informant is found murdered, Booth and CIA agent Danny Beck must work together to track down an Afghani terrorist.
episodes.title: The Source in the Sludge

episodes.synopsis: A repo man's remains are found in a septic tank, and the team identifies several suspects from his troubled past.
episodes.title: The Repo Man in the Septic Tank

episodes.synopsis: When an actor from a children's TV show is found dead, the team learns that he was known for his promiscuity, and they uncover some unlikely suspects.
episodes.title: The Carrot in the Kudzu

episodes.synopsis: When a wealthy artifact collector walks into his own funeral, it's up to the team to figure out whose remains are in his urn.
episodes.title: The Turn in the Urn

episodes.synopsis: When the body of a woman suffering from lupus is discovered in the woods, the team discovers she was using medical marijuana.
episodes.title: The High in the Low

episodes.synopsis: While investigating the murder of a woman whose body was found in a swamp, the team discovers that she was cryogenically frozen.
episodes.title: The Cold in the Case

episodes.synopsis: The remains of a wealthy woman are found in a national park, and the team believes she may be the Ghost Killer's latest victim.
episodes.title: The Nail in the Coffin

episodes.synopsis: The team investigates the murder of a community college swim coach, while Booth goes before a congressional subcommittee.
episodes.title: The Drama in the Queen

episodes.synopsis: When a conspiracy theorist is murdered just before a scheduled meeting with Booth, the team stumbles on a growing conspiracy of their own.
episodes.title: The Recluse in the Recliner
